    1: import pandas as pd
    2: 
    3: 
    4: def test_repr():
    5:     df = pd.DataFrame({"A": pd.array([True, False, None], dtype="boolean")})
    6:     expected = "       A\n0   True\n1  False\n2   <NA>"
    7:     assert repr(df) == expected
    8: 
    9:     expected = "0     True\n1    False\n2     <NA>\nName: A, dtype: boolean"
   10:     assert repr(df.A) == expected
   11: 
   12:     expected = "<BooleanArray>\n[True, False, <NA>]\nLength: 3, dtype: boolean"
   13:     assert repr(df.A.array) == expected
